user.text: i am going to have a job interview next week .
could you give me some advice ?

logs.agent: sure . first of all , it is very important for you not to be late . job interviewers usually do not think very highly of a candidate who arrives ten minutes after the appointed time , only to explain that he could not find the place or that there was heavy traffic .
so you would better explore the place the day before and at the same time , look around to see what the employees are wearing . so the next day you will arrive early for the appointment .

user.text: i will try my best to make a good impression on the interviewer .

logs.agent: that is right . you need to create a good image in a limited time , usually about 30 to 45 minutes .

user.text: it is always easier to say something than to do it .

logs.agent: it is not too difficult to make a good impression . for example , you should take care to appear well groomed and modestly dressed . avoid the extremes of a too elaborate or too casual style . this will put you on the same level as other applicants and make the interviewer consider more important qualifications .

user.text: but i love wearing t shirts and jeans .

logs.agent: i advise you not to wear a too casual style when going to an interview . informal clothes as well as torn jeans and dirty shoes convey the impression that you are not serious about the job , or that you may be casual about your work as you are about your clothes .

user.text: it is a pity that i cannot afford more expensive clothes .

logs.agent: you misunderstood me . clothes which are too colorful or too expensive suggest that you do not understand what behavior is appropriate for the job , or that you are snobbish or frivolous .

user.text: i ought to wear right clothes at the right time .

logs.agent: you got it . only in this way can you gain the respect of the interviewer and his confidence in your judgement .

user.text: it seems that ' clothes make the man ' .

logs.agent: it may not be true , but the first and lasting impression of you is determined by your clothes and behavior .

user.text: what is the difference between the board of directors ,

logs.agent: no , there is a definite difference . you know , the stockholders are the people who own the company . they are the financial control system . then there is the ceo — the chief executive officer . he is the hot shot , the main guy who is the boss . if there is only one person with absolute power in the organization , everyone knows that the power will go to their head . it is too dangerous . that is the reason for a board of directors . the board is made up of people who are experts in the industry . they could be related to the organization , but more commonly , they are independent and non biased .

user.text: how many people are on the board of directors ?

logs.agent: usually not more than 15 , not less than 10 . they meet monthly , quarterly , or biannually to oversee an organization or company . they provide long term planing and vision , and also act as moral watchdogs rto keep the company in line .

wait , there is more ! then you need to introduce and describe your goods or services . what they are and how they are different from competitors' ? then comes the hard part , a market analysis . you need to investigate and analyze hundreds of variables ! you need to take into consideration socioeconomic factors from gdp per capita to how many children on average the population has ! all this information is useful so that you can move on to your strategy and implementation stage , where you will describe in detail how you will actually execute your idea .

almost , the most important piece of information for your investors will be the financial analysis . here you will calculate and estimate sales , cash flow and profits . after all , people will want to know when they will begin to see a return on their investment !
